metadata.title: Mystic Tarot Reading - Unveil Your Destiny
metadata.description: Unveil your destiny with the ancient wisdom of the cards. Professional tarot card divination and fortune telling platform with multiple spreads and multilingual support.

about.title: About Tarot
about.subtitle: Discover the Ancient Wisdom Tradition
about.history: Tarot cards originated in 15th-century Europe, initially appearing as playing cards. Over time, Tarot evolved into a powerful divination tool for gaining insight into life's mysteries and guiding future paths.
about.wisdom: Each Tarot card contains profound symbolic meanings. Through the combination of 78 cards, it can reveal the wisdom of the subconscious and help us understand the challenges and opportunities in life.
about.purpose: Here, we combine ancient Tarot wisdom with modern technology to provide you with a convenient and profound divination experience. Let the mystical cards guide your path forward.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in Touch
contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us via email.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Protecting Your Personal Information
privacy.dataCollection: We only collect information necessary to provide tarot reading services. We do not collect any personally identifiable information, and your questions and reading results are stored locally only.
privacy.dataUsage: Collected information is used solely to improve user experience, including saving your language preferences and reading history. We do not use your information for commercial purposes or share it with third parties.
privacy.dataProtection: We employ advanced security measures to protect your data, including encrypted storage and secure transmission. You have the right to delete your local data at any time.

answers.howItWorks: Tarot reading is based on an ancient symbolic system that provides insight and guidance through randomly drawn card combinations. Each card has its unique meaning, combined with your question to provide personalized interpretation.
answers.accuracy: Tarot reading is an inspirational tool designed to provide perspectives and possible directions. The significance of results lies in helping you reflect and gain new perspectives, rather than predicting a definite future.
answers.multiple: Yes, you can perform new readings at any time. Different questions or readings at different times may yield different insights, reflecting the dynamic changes in life.
answers.languages: Our platform supports Chinese, English, French, Arabic, and Hindi, providing native language experiences for global users.
